about_the_game:
You will control a candy spaceship in the shape of a whale as it navigates through the Candy Universe. Its goal is to reach the distant Candy Planet! Your spaceship will collect candy meteorites in space and convert them into fuel, enabling a journey lasting over 400 years.

Lazy Gamer

You only need to place the spaceship in the background, and it will run on its own. However, don't forget to occasionally check its progress.

Rich Spaceship Equipment

Various spaceship equipment will generate synergistic effects, allowing you to accumulate more candies and increase speed over time.

Multiple Crew Members

Scientists, engineers, drivers, prophets... They will unlock different skills to assist in spaceship navigation.

Warping

Continuously warp and traverse through time and space, making your spaceship increasingly powerful.
